author: HTleo
body: GME 💼 holding a lot of work. Thank God, for quality stocks like HD, AMAT, and INTC saving my 🥓. No more pump and dump memes for me.

author: joesirc
body:
Definitely feel like LLY is going to pop back from the hard dip it took today. They have strong results for COVID treatment in nursing homes in case of vaccine resistance. They also have a lot of other therapeutics to bring to the table.

Also feeling bullish about semiconductors and Solid state storage (AMD INTC TSM MU AMAT) 

I also have good feelings about LOGI and GE, more of hunches than market research on those two though.

author: chiggaroni
body:
Yup, great company and underrated. 
With the expanding semi-conductors industry, AMAT is going to crush earnings on Feb 18

author: joesirc
body: LLY GE TSM MU AMAT AMD

body: Why is nobody talking about $AMAT. Free money calls are printing

body: SONO, SMG, AMAT, ETSY

author: Legolas_i_am
body: Anyone else eyeing AMAT ?

author: standardalias
body: If you like this, you should look into AMAT. they sell the hardware to make all these fancy chips.

author: Rankine
body:
Semi conductors also boomed like 2 weeks ago when TSM, AMAT, KLAC, LRCX, ASML all went up between 15-30%. 

They aren't lagging, they were ahead.

author: standardalias
body: Sono, amat and etsy. Sell all before they report, but enjoy the rise

author: HTleo
body: $AMAT will crush it next 12 months.

author: beefstake
body:
Plays on shortage are fabs, not fabless design companies like ACEV/THBR.

If you want to get in on the fab capacity shortage you should be buying TSM, AMAT, ASML, etc.

author: RandyTomfoolery
body: AMAT

author: Onidrift
body: AMD DKNG  AMAT  VRM

author: BruceInc
body: MKSI has been dipping lately. Which is surprising for such a strong stock. It’s been my rock for a while, but lately idk. Thank god my Amat positions keep printing.

author: sramadu
body:
Both are expected to do well and I'veheld LRCX stocks for a few years now. They make semiconductor capital equipment and as the demand for memory and 5G increases, so does their sales. I cant say that LRCX can go higher in the stock price since it shot up a lot over the last 2 years. AMAT may have more room to increase than LRCX.
This is not financial advise.

author: quintooo3
body: What do you think of LRCX or AMAT?

author: standardalias
body: The semi play?  Is everyone getting smart and dog piling into AMAT?

author: RedWingWay
body: AMAT finally showing some life. Just got in on QCOM hoping they can regain some of the momentum they had going.

author: t33po
body:
IWM going up ~8% in the last week is the clearest signal we will ever get of a rotation into value and recovery stocks. Financially sound small caps and beaten down travel/retail/CRE are gonna get a taste of this mega bubble as tech and speculation stocks start getting into scary territory. BA, DIS, AAL, and commercial REITs.

Also AMAT.

Source: redditor.

body: AMAT, ETSY, and SONO all looking to have a fantastic open at this rate.
